EmailTemplate.name: ATMaas.10-17-20 BNK ATM as a Service Email 2.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Infographic: What Exactly Does ATM as a Service Cover?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Explore How ATM as a Service Frees Your FI to Focus on the Future ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> When you choose ATM as a Service, you can confidently hand off every element of your end-to-end ATM management.
No more worrying about managing hardware or software maintenance. Security updates. Reporting, cash management, multiple vendor management and more.
We do it all for you as the strategic, experienced partner you can trust to deliver operational efficiency, high availability and continuous innovation across your ATM network.
Download our infographic to see how it works. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Hear more about NCR ATM as a Service from our customer ING Bank Śląski at RBR Branch Transformation 23rd Nov 13:05 – 13:30pm GMT ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
